channel.title: Comments on: The Tale of the Missing Backpack

item.title: By: I got my bag back! at The Observer's Log
item.dc:creator: I got my bag back! at The Observer's Log
item.description: [...] was cheesed that I had to call anybody, for the record. When British Airlines lost my bag (mostly due to my fault, I should add), they delivered it to me at my hotel. Not remotely as much [...]
item.content:encoded: […] was cheesed that I had to call anybody, for the record. When British Airlines lost my bag (mostly due to my fault, I should add), they delivered it to me at my hotel. Not remotely as much […]
